DONATE_DESC: Radio Rasclat is a non-commercial radio stations based on donations, backers and sponsors.
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Radio Rasclat was originally initialised for the tour of the Kunsthochschule Kassel under the name Radio Rundgang as a project. During the opening hours we streamed live music from the basement of the basic class Visual Communication. This radio gives our artists/DJs a platform to try out and play.
OPEN_SOURCE_DESC: Diese Radio-Web-App ist Open Source und basiert auf Angular, NodeJS, Express und MongoDB. Der vollständige Source Code befindet sich auf
